# Paean AI Blog

> Technical blog and comparison matrix for Paean - the External Memory Management & AI OS platform. Paean captures your complete 24-hour life context through multimodal sensors and transforms it into actionable intelligence.

## About Paean

Paean is a privacy-first AI agent platform that combines:
- **24h Life Context**: Continuous multimodal capture (audio, health metrics, location)
- **External Memory Management**: Long-term semantic memory across all your data
- **CLI + Cloud Hybrid**: Worker agents that execute on your local machine with cloud intelligence
- **Hardware Integration**: Paean Ring and Paean Pal wearables for always-on sensing

## Paean vs Others (Quick Comparison)

| Capability | Paean | Others |
|------------|-------|--------|
| 24h Life Context | ✅ Full multimodal | ❌ Limited/None |
| Privacy-First | ✅ Local-first processing | ⚠️ Cloud-dependent |
| Energy Tracking | ✅ Ring integration | ❌ No hardware |
| Long-term Memory | ✅ Semantic search | ⚠️ Session-based |
| Proactive Actions | ✅ TDRC Worker System | ⚠️ Reactive only |

### Comparison Pages
- [Paean vs Linear](/vs/linear): R&D efficiency vs personal energy management

- [Paean vs Cursor](/vs/cursor): AI coding with full life context
- [Paean vs Claude Code](/vs/claude-code): Terminal agents with persistent memory
- [Paean vs ChatGPT/Gemini](/vs/chatgpt-gemini): General AI vs contextual life agent
- [Paean vs OpenClaw](/vs/openclaw): Self-hosted agents comparison
